Name: Energia
About the game: Made by a single developer, Energia is a base building game in which you create and manage an energy network. Each level provides an interesting new spin on the core mechanics to keep you on your toes encouraging adaptation and creativity. Energia's simple design is accessible to all while providing depth for those who seek it. 10 levels Hard version of each level
